languages.text: [Прикоснуться к его плечу] "Ты не обязан носить все это в себе. Поделись со мной".
[Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."
languages.original_text: [Прикоснуться к его плечу] "Ты не обязан носить все это в себе. Поделись со мной".

traits.locale_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."
[Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."
[Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."
[Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."
[Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

languages.text: [Lui toucher l'épaule] « Aucune loi ne vous oblige à refouler vos émotions. Dites-moi ce qui vous préoccupe. »
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [Lui toucher l'épaule] « Aucune loi ne vous oblige à refouler vos émotions. Dites-moi ce qui vous préoccupe. »

languages.text: [肩に触れる]「全部一人で抱え込まなきゃいけないないなんて、どんな法にも書かれはていないよ。{mf|俺|私}に話してくれ」
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [肩に触れる]「全部一人で抱え込まなきゃいけないないなんて、どんな法にも書かれはていないよ。{mf|俺|私}に話してくれ」

languages.text: [Tocarle el hombro] «Ninguna ley le obliga a soportarlo todo por su cuenta. Comparta conmigo su carga».
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [Tocarle el hombro] «Ninguna ley le obliga a soportarlo todo por su cuenta. Comparta conmigo su carga».

languages.text: [抚摸他的肩膀]“法律并没有要求你一个人承担这一切，和我说说你的负担吧。”
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [抚摸他的肩膀]“法律并没有要求你一个人承担这一切，和我说说你的负担吧。”

languages.text: [Omzuna dokun] "Hiçbir kanun, seni bu yükü tek başına taşımaya zorlamıyor. Anlat bana, yükünü paylaş."
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [Omzuna dokun] "Hiçbir kanun, seni bu yükü tek başına taşımaya zorlamıyor. Anlat bana, paylaş benimle yükünü."

languages.text: [Seine Schulter berühren] "Kein Gesetz besagt, dass Ihr alles in Euch tragen müsst. Redet mit mir."
languages.original_text: [Touch his shoulder] "No law says you have to carry it all inside. Share it with me."

traits.locale_text: [Seine Schulter berühren] "Kein Gesetz besagt, dass Ihr alles in Euch tragen müsst. Redet mit mir."
